Course-name: Introduction to Abstract and Linear Algebra
content: Abstract and Linear Algebra are applicable to every discipline, be it engineering and technology, economics or social sciences. It is essential for the students to get acquainted with the subject of Abstract and Linear Algebra at an early stage. The present course has been designed to introduce the subject to undergraduate/postgraduate students in science and engineering. The course contains a good introduction to each topic and an advance treatment of theory at a fairly understandable level to the students at this stage.
